user_device_rel: 1 person to n devices; n people to m devices
use_cases_desc: Display tiling; Data transfer by pouring through tapping
contribution_desc:
Explores distributed sensing techniques for mobile devices using synchronous gestures. These are patterns of activity, contributed by multiple users (or one
user with multiple devices).
tracking_characteristic: Multiple screens; Positioning left/right; Relative location; Tracking devices only; Inside-out tracking
additional_hardware: custom sensors for movement, vibration, tilt, contact force; touch sensor for holding
